review_blob: Bitburger is selling-out to make sales with punk-ass youths with no taste. Watery, artificial- abomination. Its absolutely disgusting.

Bitburger Radler does not match-up to some of the competition it faces in Germany. Bitburger Pils is not a good mixing beer, the taste is just too distinct. Karlsburg Saar-Radler is a suprerior alternative- it is lighter and more refreshing.

Bitburger is by far one of the most consistent beers I have ever tasted. It is a crisp refreshing pilsner that has a very distinct, soft nose, and bitter taste. It is very difficult to find a good bitter pilsner, even in Germany most of them tend to be too sweet for me. Anyway, get your hands on this beer- its awesome!
